query:
SELECT po.id, po.poNumber, po.status, po.totalAmount, COUNT(li.id) as lineItemCount 
FROM purchase_orders po 
LEFT JOIN po_line_items li ON po.id = li.poId 
WHERE po.poNumber = '546337' 
GROUP BY po.id;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user tzGyVcj9oHnaUv9.3cfa47fa1e17 --database bQwuvX7ycRD88MLXJHLZXd --execute SELECT po.id, po.poNumber, po.status, po.totalAmount, COUNT(li.id) as lineItemCount 
FROM purchase_orders po 
LEFT JOIN po_line_items li ON po.id = li.poId 
WHERE po.poNumber = '546337' 
GROUP BY po.id;
